NO_INTERNET_CONNECTION: It looks like you don't have internet access. You can try again when you have access again.
ERROR_UNKNOWN: There appears to be a problem with the remote server. Please try again later.
ERROR_NO_INTERNET_CONNECTION:
No internet connection.
Press to refresh.
BUTTON_ERROR_UNKNOWN:
Remote server error.
Press to refresh.
TITLE_SEND_MOVEMENT: Sending pending movements in progress. Thank you for your patience.
ERROR_SERVER: Server currently unavailable. The movement has been saved to your mobile.

- Retrieve the start, end or change activity movements
- Calculate and record the time elapsed between two movements
- Inform the user about the count of a certain number of counters displayed
- The calculation of the elapsed time as well as the choice of the displayed counters are the responsibility of your employer

CONFIDENTIAL_2: The data exchanged between your mobile phone and the NIVA server is secured and encrypted by certificate.
ERROR_SAME_PASSWORD: The two passwords are not the same
ERROR_CREDENTIALS: The username and / or password is incorrect.
TEXT_LOST_PASSWORD: Enter your e-mail. A link allowing you to renew your password will be sent to you.
